title: So Warwick is in Soraka's Lore
body: So i'm sure we all know {{champion:16}} 's Lore and {{champion:19}} 's involvement, itd be cool if raka gets an update in the near future because of the ww rework since his lore is different now

replies.body: You're talking to the company that _still_ hasn't finished retconning the League of Legends from champion lores.

I think Riot plans to update the lores as they go about the regions. Last year they redid everyone on Mt Targon, now they're going over champions from Piltover and Zaun. I assume when they get to Ionia they'll fix up Soraka's lore, and presumably the other champs with outdated lores as well. Lee Sin in particular is a pretty egregious offender since he was so tied to the Institute and summoners.
They should still include the other in their new lores at least. ;_;
